description: Empire_Md | An all-in-one WhatsApp Bot For Music 🎶 , Smart Features 🤖. Fast , Reliable, and awesome 🚀

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Keep your WhatsApp always online, put true to activate

ANTICALL.description: To Enable put true and to disable put false

ANTICALL_MSG.description: Message sent when a call is rejected

ANTILINK.description: true or false to deletes or kicks link senders from group

AUTO_LIKE_EMOJI.description: Emoji to use for automatic status liking

AUTO_LIKE_STATUS.description: true or false to automatically like statuses

AUTO_RECORDING.description: true or false to show recording status

AUTO_TYPING.description: true or false to show typing status

AUTO_VIEW_STATUS.description: use true or false to view all status or not.

MODE.description: Bot mode can be public, private, inbox, or groups

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Owner's phone number with country code
